The problem is that Spicer clarified to say he meant more people watching online, at home, live on Facebook, etc. And honestly, with Facebook live, I believe that this was the most watched inauguration. I think with how quickly media changes, every inauguration will be more watched (at home) than the last. But he clearly had a very small in-person showing.
